review: I purchased the fire stick because Amazon made me an offer I couldn't refuse!  We have found it to be very useful for us to have at our vacation condo in FL.  Long story short, cable providers do not offer an economical means to have cable for people that own a vacation home and are part time residents.  It makes no sense to spend over $100/month for cable services we only use a total of 3 months a year. So, we do have internet in the condo and the Fire Stick coupled with the Kindle HD mirroring gives us a phenomenal choice of TV entertainment using services we already subscribe to such as Amazon Prime movies, Xfinity, and HBO Go.
